name: Production Orders in Progress
query:
SELECT
  `tabProduction Order`.name as "Production Order:Link/Production Order:140",
  `tabProduction Order`.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
  `tabProduction Order`.sales_order as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:80",
  `tabProduction Order`.reference_client as "Reference::140",
  `tabProduction Order`.creation as "Date:Date:80",
  `tabProduction Order`.production_item as "Item:Link/Item:300",
  `tabProduction Order`.qty as "To Produce:Int:80",
  `tabProduction Order`.produced_qty as "Produced:Int:80"
FROM
  `tabProduction Order`
WHERE
  `tabProduction Order`.docstatus=1
  AND `tabProduction Order`.status= "In Process"
  AND ifnull(`tabProduction Order`.produced_qty,0) < `tabProduction Order`.qty
  AND EXISTS (SELECT name from `tabStock Entry` where production_order =`tabProduction Order`.name)
